title: Fabrication of a novel nanofiltration membrane using an Mg–Fe layered double hydroxide for dye/salt separation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24055-24065
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03366C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiuzhen Wei, Zelong Chen, Mengjia He, Liangliang Xu, Yue Li, Jia Yang, Xuekang Zhang, Xianghao Zhang, Ze Wang, Shiyu Cao, Qinghua Zhou, Bingjun Pan
Mg–Fe LDH accelerated the diffusion of PIP, which decreased the thickness of the selective layer and improved the permeation flux of modified NF membranes. Mg–Fe LDHm could separate dye and NaCl molecules effectively.
